paragraphs.text: For we have been called, brethren, and are now called together, by Wisdom, and according to the Evangelical parable, to that great and heavenly Supper, and sufficient for every creature; I mean, to the Passover,-to Christ, Who is sacrificed; for `Christ our Passover is sacrificed.' (And afterwards:) They, therefore, that are thus prepared shall hear, `Enter into the joy of thy Lord[fn-97-P9731_3483761:1-nf] .'
